description: Dale McLaughlan travelled across the Irish Sea on a water scooter to see his girlfriend, a court hears.
title: Covid: Man jailed for Scotland-Isle of Man water scooter crossing
title_page: Covid: Man jailed for Scotland-Isle of Man water scooter crossing - BBC News
maintext: After he arrived in Ramsey at about 13:00 GMT, he walked another 15 miles (25km) to his girlfriend's home in Douglas, who believed he had been on the island working for several weeks, the court was told.
